pgrid
Class DataItem

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      pgrid.util.LexicalDefaultHandler
          pgrid.DataItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Comparable, ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler, LexicalHandler, DataItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
IdentityDataItem, SimpleDataItem, SimpleDataItem
public abstract class DataItem
extends LexicalDefaultHandler
implements DataItem, Comparable, Cloneable

This class represents a shared Gridella file.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Roman Schmidt
